title: Ann Beattie | Trump Threatens Iran on Twitter: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the president threatening Iran on Twitter as the people around him push for a conflict.

Then, Ann Beattie discusses her writing process, reveals how she came up with the title for her book A Wonderful Stroke of Luck and talks about getting mistaken for other writers.

She also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
